00007 bool ORKatrinFLTEnergyHistogramDecoder::SetDataRecord(UInt_t* dataRecord) 
00008 {
00009   fDataRecord = dataRecord;
00010   fHistogramLength = HistogramLengthOf(dataRecord);
00011 
00012   ORLog(kDebug) << "SetDataRecord(): Setting the data record..." << std::endl;
00013   // remarks for Till: LengthOf(...) is from ORVDataDecoder and is the length extracted from data record -tb-
00014   //TODO: need to implement IsValid() ... -tb-  if(!IsValid() || LengthOf(fDataRecord) != kBufHeadLen + fHistogramLength) {
00015   if(LengthOf(fDataRecord) != kBufHeadLen + fHistogramLength) {
00016     ORLog(kDebug) << "SetDataRecord(): data record is not valid" << std::endl;
00017     ORLog(kDebug) << "LengthOf(data record) : " << LengthOf(fDataRecord)
00018       << " kBufHeadLen + fHistogramLength: " << kBufHeadLen + fHistogramLength << std::endl;
00019     fDataRecord = NULL;
00020     fHistogramLength = -1;
00021     return false;
00022   }
00023   ORLog(kDebug) << "SetDataRecord(): Exiting" << std::endl;
00024   return true;
00025 }

00028 size_t ORKatrinFLTEnergyHistogramDecoder::CopyHistogramData(UInt_t* histogram, 
00029                                                      size_t len )
00030 //copies the histogram data to the array pointed to by
00031 //histogram, which is of length len
00032 {
00033 
00034   //ORLog(kDebug) << "Entered CopyHistogramData  ... fDataRecord="  << fDataRecord << std::endl;
00035 
00036   size_t wflen = HistogramLengthOf(fDataRecord);
00037   if (wflen == 0) return 0;
00038   if ((len < wflen) || (len == 0)) {
00039     ORLog(kWarning) << "CopyHistogramData(): destination array length is " << len 
00040                     << "; histogram data length is " << HistogramLengthOf(fDataRecord) << std::endl;
00041   }
00042   else len = HistogramLengthOf(fDataRecord);; 
00043   UInt_t* histogramData = GetHistogramDataPointer();
00044   for(size_t i=0;i<len;i++) 
00045   {
00046     histogram[i] = histogramData[i];  
00047     ORLog(kWarning) << "CopyHistogramData():   histogram[i]" <<  histogram[i] 
00048                     << "histogramData[i] " << histogramData[i]  << std::endl;
00049   }
00050   return len;
00051 }

00056 std::string ORKatrinFLTEnergyHistogramDecoder::GetParName(size_t iPar)
00057 {
00058   switch(iPar) {
00059     case 0: return "crate";
00060     case 1: return "card";
00061     case 2: return "channel";
00062     case 3: return "readoutSec";
00063     case 4: return "refreshTime";
00064     case 5: return "firstBin";
00065     case 6: return "lastBin";
00066     case 7: return "histogramLength";
00067     case 8: return "maxHistogramLength";
00068     case 9: return "binSize";
00069     case 10:return "offsetEMin";
00070     default:
00071       ORLog(kWarning) << "GetParName(): index (" << iPar
00072                       << ") out of range." << std::endl;
00073       return "unknown";
00074   }
00075 }
00076 
00077 UInt_t ORKatrinFLTEnergyHistogramDecoder::GetPar(UInt_t* record, size_t iPar, size_t /*iRow*/)
00078 {
00079   switch(iPar) {
00080     case 0: return CrateOf(record);
00081     case 1: return CardOf(record);
00082     case 2: return ChannelOf(record);
00083     case 3: return ReadoutSecOf(record);
00084     case 4: return RefreshTimeOf(record);
00085     case 5: return FirstBinOf(record);
00086     case 6: return LastBinOf(record);
00087     case 7: return HistogramLengthOf(record);
00088     case 8: return MaxHistogramLengthOf(record);
00089     case 9: return BinSizeOf(record);
00090     case 10:return OffsetEMinOf(record);
00091     default:
00092       ORLog(kWarning) << "GetPar(): index (" << iPar
00093                       << ") out of range." << std::endl;
00094       return 0;
00095   }
00096 }
